abstract: Amazon’s computing services push has taken a new turn with a MP3, photo and software delivery business.
snippet: Amazon’s computing services push has taken a new turn with a MP3, photo and software delivery business.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com’s curious ambitions as a computing infrastructure provider continue to grow. The company this week revealed a new service that will help companies of all sizes ship files like MP3s and software packages to people scattered around the globe.
